content: शुष् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (शुष्यति, शुष्क) {@--1@} To be dried, become dry or parched up; तृषा शुष्यत्यास्ये पिबति सलिलं स्वादु सुरभि <ls>Bh. 3. 92.</ls> {@--2@} to be withered. {@--3@} To languish, become emaciated; <ls>Pt. 1. 49.</ls> {@--4@} To be afflicted or distressed. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (शोषयति-ते) {@--1@} To dry up, wither, parch; न शोषयति मारुतः <ls>Bg. 2. 23.</ls> {@--2@} To emaciate. {@--3@} To destroy. {@--4@} To extinguish. {@--5@} To drain, suck up, absorb. {@--6@} To exhaust, empty. --WITH उद --परि {@--1@} to be dried up, dry up; <ls>Bk. 10. 41</ls>; <ls>Bg. 1. 29.</ls> {@--2@} to pine, decay, wither. -वि, -सं to be dried up.
